ch.threema.apitool

Class APIConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.threema.apitool.APIConnector

  • public class APIConnector
extends Object
    Facilitates HTTPS communication with the Threema Message API.

    • Method Detail

      • sendTextMessageSimple

        public String sendTextMessageSimple(String to,
                                    String text)
                             throws IOException
        Send a text message with server-side encryption.
        Parameters:
        to - recipient ID
        text - message text (max. 3500 bytes)
        Returns:
        message ID
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication or server error occurs

      • sendE2EMessage

        public String sendE2EMessage(String to,
                             byte[] nonce,
                             byte[] box)
                      throws IOException
        Send an end-to-end encrypted message.
        Parameters:
        to - recipient ID
        nonce - nonce used for encryption (24 bytes)
        box - encrypted message data (max. 4000 bytes)
        Returns:
        message ID
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication or server error occurs

      • lookupPhone

        public String lookupPhone(String phoneNumber)
                   throws IOException
        Lookup an ID by phone number. The phone number will be hashed before being sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number in E.164 format
        Returns:
        the ID, or null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication or server error occurs

      • lookupEmail

        public String lookupEmail(String email)
                   throws IOException
        Lookup an ID by email address. The email address will be hashed before being sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        email - the email address
        Returns:
        the ID, or null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication or server error occurs

      • lookupKey

        public byte[] lookupKey(String id)
                 throws IOException
        Lookup a public key by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID whose public key is desired
        Returns:
        the corresponding public key, or null if not found
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication or server error occurs

                                     throws IOException
        Lookup the capabilities of a ID
        Parameters:
        threemaId - The ID whose capabilities should be checked
        Returns:
        The capabilities, or null if not found

                           APIConnector.ProgressListener progressListener)
                    throws IOException
        Download a file given its blob ID.
        Parameters:
        blobId - The blob ID of the file
